name: I’m Gonna Kill The Ones Who Hurt Me And Everybody Else Because Now I Got Superpowers (Full Project and Assets)
name_original: I’m Gonna Kill The Ones Who Hurt Me And Everybody Else Because Now I Got Superpowers (Full Project and Assets)
description:
Get The Full Project and Original Assets!

Play the game for free and if you like it, consider donating so I can keep making weird and crazy stuff in game format.

Donate $1,00 or more and you'll get the entire Construct 2 project which comes with the sprites, SFX, music, animations and all the assets from the game.

Oh! And if you make a game with the assets let me know! I'll love to see it. Especially if it a crazy kind of game.

This game was made as part of the One Game a Week Challenge.

("Valkyrie Demo - We Are The Future" not included in the pack)
